The Sangria Doctrine
\"The Home Of The World-Finalist Self-Health Lecture Series\"
Sangria
The Doctrine

"Let me tell you a story"

 Falijah Hume leans back in his tweed armchair.

 "It was the early aughts and Black Box Wines was sweeping the nation. Never before had there been a mass market premium box wine. My wife and I had just returned from a seven month sabbatical in Berlin. The private elevator to our condo was broken so we had to walk down the hall for the first month back in the states. Box wine was simply convenient to carry!"

 Sniffles purrs while sitting in the sun atop a wild stack of books. Sniffles has grey fur that appears to be golden in the evening sun. Sniffles is Dr. Hume’s cat, or as he calls her with a chuckle, \“my administrative assistant\”.

 "The box wine was actively damaging our sensitive palettes. I don’t know, it was like we could taste the plastic. We hadn’t yet been to the grocery store so we had no fresh fruit. I turned to my wife and I said ‘Look around us. I bet we could find some way to turn what we have into Sangria’. So that’s what we did. We looked around the apartment in search of ingredients for Sangria."

 "You have to keep an open mind when trying to make Sangria. Ask yourself about every item you grab: ‘Could this be Sangria?’\”

 Sniffles jumps down onto Dr. Hume’s lap.

 "The answers may surprise you.'"
Dr. Falijah Hume MeHD

Dr. Hume emigrated from Texas in the early 90s and made the eastern United States his home. Assimilation into American culture was hard for him and made worse by his Anosmia, a rare disorder resulting in the inability to smell.
\"People always tell me that when you lose a sense, another becomes heightened. That must be why I have such a keen sense of wonder.\"
Following his patriation to the United States, Dr. Hume developed The Sangria Doctrine.
Father Max Samberg
Author of Hummus for the Homeless, Father Samberg has traveled the world sharing his insight.
\"The convective currents in steeping tea are life energy. You need to absorb that energy into your life. You need to drink it in by surrounding yourself with mugs of steeping tea.\"
Father Samberg infuses his teachings with a unique blend of god-proven perspectives.
Don Bergston, Certified Artisan
Four-time American artist, Don Bergston has crafted his techniques with a rigor undue for most artforms
\"If you never try, you can never fail. If you give up, you can never achieve your goals. So I say, \'Don\'t try or give up. Succeeding the first time never fails.\'\"
Don Bergston was the first in a series of Certified Artisans to endorse The Sangria Doctrine
